alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Colorado and central Austin Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Bellville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Colorado and central Austin Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
